posts.name: Tony Hawks Pro Skater 1+2 - PS4
posts.details: The most classic skate games in history are back. Play the fully remastered version of Tony Hawk’s ™ Pro Skater ™ and Tony Hawk’s ™ Pro Skater ™ 2 in an incredible collection, recreated from scratch in high definition.

posts.name: Resident Evil 3 Remake - PS4
posts.details: Jill Valentine é uma das últimas pessoas em Raccoon City a testemunhar as atrocidades que a Umbrella cometeu. Para pará-la a Umbrella libera sua arma secreta suprema: Nemesis!
